item.title: Pope Leo XIV live updates: New pope addresses faithful at Vatican
item.description: Pope Leo XIV was elected as the Catholic Church's 267th leader on Thursday.

item.title: Trump predicts 'big week' in Russia-Ukraine peace talks
item.description: President Donald Trump suggested imminent progress in peace talks between Russia and Ukraine in a post to Truth Social early on Sunday.

item.title: WATCH: Nashville Zoo announces birth of tiny southern pudu
item.description: Nashville Zoo celebrated Motherâ€™s Day early as it announced the birth of a male southern pudu.

item.title: WATCH: Animals react as earthquake rattles Tennessee
item.description: Animals reacted as a 4.1 preliminary magnitude earthquake rattled parts of Tennessee Saturday. No injuries or damages were immediately reported.

item.title: India accuses Pakistan of violating ceasefire, says it will respond
item.description: Tensions had been rising since an April attack on Indian-controlled Kashmir.
